possible_choices: The probability of the test statistic under the null hypothesis is at most 5%.
The alternate hypothesis can be rejected at 0.05 level.
The integral of the density for the test statistic from the observed value to infinity is lower-bounded by 0.05.
choice_explanations: No, the null hypothesis can be rejected at the 0.05 level.
Not quite. It is upper-bounded by 0.05.
